imdb.plot outline: When Kyle's grandfather passes away, he and his family spend a few days visiting with his grandmother to plan the funeral. Being forced to share a bed with his father (due to a lack of bedrooms), he is kept up all night from his father's annoying snoring. This leads to Kyle contemplating his future and a plan to get back at his father. A spin-off from the series In the Bedroom (2014).
imdb.title: From the Snoring
plot: Kyle must survive a week at his grandmother's house when he is forced to share a bedroom with his father who snores loudly. A spin-off from the series In the Bedroom (2014).::Angelwood Pictures

When Kyle's grandfather passes away, he and his family spend a few days visiting with his grandmother to plan the funeral. Being forced to share a bed with his father (due to a lack of bedrooms), he is kept up all night from his father's annoying snoring. This leads to Kyle contemplating his future and a plan to get back at his father. A spin-off from the series In the Bedroom (2014).::Angelwood Pictures
